author: Star
name: Screenshot
install_msg:
Thank you for installing this cog!
Do `[p]help CogName` to get the list of commands and their description. This cog can only be ran by you, the bot owner. If you want to help translate, go to my [crowdin](<https://crowdin.com/project/Star-Cogs>)
If you like my work, [donate me!](<https://ko-fi.com/starcogs>)

This is just a basic screenshot cog that will automatically install necessary functions for it to work so you don't have to! It basically just, run `[p]screenshot/ss <url> and it will return a screenshot of the site!
description: Automated screenshot cog! Take screenshots of any site you want/need!
